channel.title: More Old Hardstyle
channel.description:
This is a rip from Defqon 1 back in 2004. Q-Base allowed users to download the live sets, so no worries over copyrights (Not that anyone would really care, but there's rules). One again, this is good old hardstyle; non-commercial shit. [b]Contents on Info.txt:[/b]
###################################################################################### # Filename: Pila_-_Live_at_Defqon.1_(19-06-2004).mp3 # # Filesize: 33.0MB # # Title: Pila - Live at Defqon.1 (19-06-2004) # # Artist: Pila # # Album: Pila - Live at Defqon.1 (19-06-2004) # # Encoding: MPEG 1, Layer III (128kb/s) # # Length: 36:01 # # Date: 19.06.2004 # # Genre: Hardstyle # # # # Tracklist: # # 01. DJ Gizmo & DJ Norman - Gangsters # # 02. Twister Silence - Listen To Me Mama (DJ Scot Project Remix) # # 03. Jimmy The Sound - M.O.D.U.L.O (Original Mix) # # 04. Dhhd - Rush (DJ Luna & Chiren's Straighton Mix) # # 05. DJ Ricky T - Generation (Hardstyle Mix) # # 06. DJ Bizerk - Blast That Shit (Original Mix) # # 07. Brennan & Heart - Rush To The Floor # # 08. The RaIDers - Salamandra (Hardstyle Masterz Remix) # # 09. DHHD - Funky Shit (Deepack Remix) # # # # MD5SUM: 8342b07011997970edd85f1d3cdb9d5c # ######################################################################################
Download Link: [code] http://rapidshare.com/files/217166202/Pila_-_Live_at_Defqon.1__19-06-2004_.zip [/code] Please comment.

item.title: More Old Hardstyle
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:6, topic:271013”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=357699.msg2733362#msg2733362 date=1238886340]

2004 is old?

Not really, but it was the greatest year of Hardstyle; stuff after 2005 sucks.
[/quote]

Technoboy - Oh my God…

you stand corrected.[/quote]
In general.*

Read full topic
